results.title: Simvastatin attenuates lung functional and vascular effects of hyperoxia in preterm rabbits.

results.title: Novel simvastatin inhalation formulation and characterisation.
results.text_hl: In this study, a respirable and stable @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ solution pMDI formulation for inhalation has been presented that could potentially be used clinically as an anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ therapy for the treatment of several @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung diseases@@@.

results.title: Statins inhibit pulmonary artery smooth muscle cell proliferation by upregulation of HO-1 and p21WAF1.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ is a @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-CoA reductase@@@ inhibitor, which has been shown to ameliorate the development of @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@ in animal model by suppression of @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@pulmonary@@@ artery smooth muscle cells (PASMCs) proliferation, yet its underlying molecular mechanisms are not completely understood.

citations.NLM: Li M, Liu Y, Shi H, Zhang Y, Wang G, Xu J, Lu J, Zhang D, Xie X, Han D, Wu Y, Li S. Statins inhibit pulmonary artery smooth muscle cell proliferation by upregulation of HO-1 and p21WAF1. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2012 Oct;385(10):961-8. PMID: 22820842
